nodes.text: Aterph was a Devaronian male who visited the Farrimmer Cafe on the Mynock 7 Space Station. He claimed to have run away from home due to the endless nagging of his wife. In reality, he was a hired assassin who had been contracted to cause chaos on the space station. Aterph planted bombs in several businesses, including the Farrimmer Cafe. The bomb was found by the proprietors with help from a group of visiting spacers.
